## IfBlock interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

If block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IfBlock 
```

## Remarks

One of the following functions to instantiate an `IfBlock`<!-- -->. - [ifThen()](./mapping-template-compose.ifthen.md) - [ifThenElse()](./mapping-template-compose.ifthenelse.md)
